author: dildick
body:
- Removed obsolete dataformat GEMCSCLCTDigi that was never used
- Algorithm matchGEMPads was removed since it is obsolete in 81X studies. The GEM-CSC bending angle is calculated at the time the CSCCorrelatedLCTDigi is constructed. 
- Obsolete algorithm matchRPCDigis was removed. 
- Configurations for the obsolete algorithms were removed
- switch off algorithm in RE3/1, RE4/1: RPC-CSC integrated trigger primitives will not be considered for PhaseII studies

This PR to be integrated after https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/14562
title: GEM-CSC Integrated trigger clean-up
